lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I study how to extract capital from poor countries. Unfortunately Kiva doesn't let you earn interest yet. One day.

lender.name: Franck
lender.loan_because: that's the least i can do
lender.occupational_info: IT (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Information_technology)

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's my way of helping to change the world, in my own small way. Collectively we can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach, I garden, I am a mom; and I am starting my own non profit, Seeds for Peace Int'l, Inc. ,shipping seeds overseas. The seeds go to Bosnia, Uganda, Tanzania,Lesotho, Namibia, to rural poor in the USA.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I have money, would prefer to use it in future than now, and prefer to let poorer people than richer ones benefit from this fact, as I am a utilitarian and imagine they can get a larger improvement in wellbeing from a given amount of extra wealth (diminishing marginal returns!)
lender.occupational_info: Learning about economics

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their lives in a dignified manner.

lender.name: Josee & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. -Winston Churchill

lender.name: Sebastien
lender.loan_because: One for all, all for one...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a french teacher for kids (6 or 7 years).

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I care :)

lender.name: Prestimo
lender.loan_because: If you can help someone with a simple loan of a few dollars and with kiva you can reach people any where in the world it's amazing

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I like to empower my sisters
lender.occupational_info: creative, rewarding and fun

lender.name: Fernanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people to creat their means of support will make a difference in their lifes and will help remove poverty from this earth
lender.occupational_info: Helping citizens to assure their legal rights

lender.name: Carlos Miguel Sousa
lender.loan_because: Auxilia humilia firma consensus facit

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I heard about the project on the Oprah show and think it is a fantastic initiative. Together we can make the difference !

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: i'm a single mother, my daughter, Nádia is 3 years old, and i focusesall her efforts on giving her better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: i´m a cleaner , i work 8 hours a day, another hours i sell my produts of beauty.

lender.name: Ally
lender.loan_because:
people in the world are probably not as lucky as i am and the need the money more than i do! ( because sometimes i am the worst spender-buying useless things such as bouncy balls and cheap earrings.) ~by ally's awesome sister
It also makes me feel good about give other people money for things that they need. ~by me
lender.occupational_info: I don't really know because there are many things that are good.

lender.name: Subash
lender.loan_because: i believe in micro-financing

lender.name: Jolie
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in need a step up to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach second grade in a public school.

lender.name: dulce
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Shane
lender.occupational_info: I work as a child protection worker

lender.name: Mea
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to earn a good living. Everyone should have the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I sell a service to help people have access to better healthcare.

lender.name: Wendee
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed to have so much. I want to make a difference, to help others, even if it is just a little. I am thankful for freedom that allows us the opportunity to share.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children. I love teaching because I can make a difference in a child's life. Education is invaluable.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: even the littlest amount pooled together can make a great impact.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to do good works.

lender.name: Rose and Friend
lender.loan_because: everyone in the world deserves a chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: program computers for various applications

lender.name: BAER
lender.loan_because: We own a small business and like to help other small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Inventor

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful program and I would like to help.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: My mum lives in Angola she is diabetic and needs medicine. i would like to an ice maker to help my mum

lender.name: Clément
lender.loan_because: I think that private bank are not interested helping people who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in IT, modeling and programming software. Otherwise, I'm woking for a non-profit organization who organize festivals and artistic encounter.

lender.name: Sil
lender.loan_because: it's necessary and useful! Es necesario y util!

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I Can!
lender.occupational_info: Hard!

lender.name: Kyler and his gammpa
lender.loan_because: I want all parents to be able to provide for their children and grandchildren

lender.name: Jonah
lender.occupation: Free thinker, Music fanatic, and Friend
lender.loan_because: I care!!!

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance promotes economic development and helps alleviate poverty

lender.name: Robbie
lender.loan_because: A tiny gesture for me makes a world of difference for someone else in my human family.

lender.name: Radha
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunity.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to support women throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student and will be a doctor in June 2010.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories about interesting people and ideas for Fortune magazine.

lender.name: Steffani
lender.occupation: Children\'s Activities Director at health club

lender.name: Tyson
lender.occupational_info: landscape maintenance for commercial properties including but not limited to lawncare and moss control, hedge trimming, tree and shrub pruning, keeping grounds clear of rubbish and leaves, spraying for weeds and insects, power washing etc.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Because I believe in helping those who may need it - and I don't think you can truly believe something until you do something about it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager of software development.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and I want to help other people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people and help them solve their problems.

lender.name: Kaisa
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people, who are in pain.

lender.name: Nagesh
lender.loan_because: its makes you feel good and its right thing to do!

lender.name: Sónia Helder
lender.loan_because: It´s good to know you can make a diference.

lender.name: Janelle and Mark
lender.occupation: My entire Small Group is Supporting You!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva at the Oprah show and I tought it was a wonderful way to help other people to become independent and rebuilding their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Quality Management in a pharmaceutical company in Portugal.

lender.name: LUCINDA
lender.loan_because: I want everyone,everywhere,to experience a state of abundance!
lender.occupational_info: I help people to consciously access their highest selves, to vastly improve any and all areas of their lives.

lender.name: Pedro Duque
lender.loan_because: I really believe that it can make a diference.

lender.name: Melting Pot Invstmt Club
lender.loan_because: We loan to help people who are in need. As an investment club, helping others is one of our goals.
lender.occupational_info: Our group is very diversified - consisting of members of many cultural backgrounds and varying occupations - including nursing, social work, real estate, teaching and accounting

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I support those that help themselves through their responsibility and hard work. Kiva is such a wonderful organization for this kind of help. Kiva's clients should be immensely proud of themselves.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people in need in a practical way.

lender.name: Morgan Roderick
lender.loan_because: I believe that in the long run, people know best how to help themselves, and should be given the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing people with opportunities to make a difference in their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a small high school in the Dallas area for children who are in recovery from drug and/or alcohol addiction.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: its fun
lender.occupational_info: sales

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone less fortunate a chance to better themselves for themselves & their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am disable and reitred so I know how it is to live on very little but enough that I can help the people of Kiva who live on basically nothing. I feel it is my duty to help these people help themselves.

lender.name: Shiikhanur
lender.loan_because: I do it because I seem to think in the shoes of the Loaner not as the lender a humane service to good and to humanity
lender.occupational_info: id love to do more

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have come to learn that small business and innovation are some of the best tools to overcome poverty

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because:
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." ~Anne Frank~
"I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do." ~Edward Everett Hale~
"What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.” ~Albert Pike~

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have had lots of people help me be successful and I want to "pay it forward". I am very excited to be part of this community of generous people.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Chief Sales Officer for a financial consulting firm. I design stragegies for growth and through my employees expand our ability to serve clients.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I received help to become a nurse and now I want to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I was a nurse who did hospice work, helping dying patients and their families

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: microloans to the most deserving is capitalism in its finest hour; it's the right thing to do and in one small way makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in ongoing training for global telecommunications support specialists, who then work on call centers around the world, keeping the call center telecom infrastructure up and running.

lender.name: Neel & Family
lender.loan_because: micro-finance loans help people become self-sufficient. Every bit counts. Please help out, if you can.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than enough in my life and want to share what I can with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global bank and manage technology projects for them.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Kiva enables me to.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I know how critical a loan can be for anyone wanting to improve their lives, their communities and thereby the world. I primarily invest in Farming and food-related activities as I used to be a farmer and seller of vegetables at farmers markets, and I know how it is never-ending work for little money, but very rewarding in many other ways, deeply educational, and a critical glue for rural communities. I have been without access to money at various times in my life; I realize how fortunate I am, and would prefer to invest in people and communities rather than corporations.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair radiation detection equipment so individuals may protect and educate themselves. I research, develop and sell Electric Vehicles.

lender.name: Friends
lender.loan_because:
being able to give is a gift.
"If you have two shirts, give one to the poor. If you have food, share it with those who are hungry." - this is a very simple way of our humble attempt to do this.

lender.name: Brendon and Hilary
lender.loan_because: To help break the cycle of Poverty which often breeds ignorance and resentment - fertile ground for treading the path to the Dark Side. And everyone should be as happy as they choose to be.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: In Jesus' name, I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a home for the elderly.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: My husband and I started our own retail business from scratch almost 20 years ago with no employees and without the help of a bank. It was very hard work but very rewarding. We now have a larger business and 10 employees. Now that we have a successful retail business, I feel like we should return the favor to help other small business get started.
lender.occupational_info: Every day I encourage my employees to do the best job possible helping customers to meet their needs. I spend most of my time training them in understanding the product they sell and encouraging great customer service. I keep constant track of my finances and try to understand good business principals of inventory turn and profit margins. If the business is not making a profit...there is no business. Managing people and maintaining good financial business practices takes a lot of passion, discipline and time.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: my small gesture makes a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: My work helps people find their quiet place inside where peace and healing are found.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to pass along to others
lender.occupational_info: I work in a dental office and help people keep their teeth healthy.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: to help with success in small business
lender.occupational_info: marketing and operations expert in a global computer company. I work in the Asia region

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I've read too many articles and books about how the US has exploited developing countries through unpayable ecomonic deals and I want to be a part of the change to that perception
lender.occupational_info: I build out work spaces for businesses: corporate, technology firms, entertainment houses, etc; working with designers and contractors to take the idea of a space through realization

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: God has given so much to me.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is right, and fair, and just, to share.

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: We have to invest in those trying to better themselves individually if we want a better world for us all.
lender.occupational_info: work for a corporation

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Leave the world better than when you came in.

lender.name: Sofie
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for, I want to help other people who do not have so much.
lender.occupational_info: My friend and I do a job called "mother's helper". We babysit, take care of animals and plants, and help clean up our local lake. I love to dance and sing.

lender.name: Mdote
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe we are in this together. I am a first generation refugee and I am a business owner so I know their struggles trying simply to live and to make a living.

lender.name: Glaucia & Paul
lender.loan_because: Once we learnt about Kiva, and how easy it is to support a small business anywhere in the world, doing nothing was not an option! And we like the connection it provides between us and the entrepreneur, anywhere in the world - a world without borders.
lender.occupational_info: I work in management of a major utility in Perth, and Paul works in mining.

lender.name: Breianne
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world heal poverty issues.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a variety of holistic healing techniques to heal the body, mind and soul.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I need to pass it on!!

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am a business major at Harding University graduating in May

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: We respond and treat people who need medical help and transport them to a hospital.

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurs with limited resources inspire me. I am also credit to team.

lender.name: Liana
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in Japan.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: every one needs a helping hand every once in a while. When we can help those in need the world shines a little brighter.
lender.occupational_info: Helping secondary school students work on their homework to acheive their goals and graduate.

lender.name: John Cornett
lender.loan_because: we are all connected...

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I will no longer fund Kiva loans due to the fact that Kiva actively supports extreme animal cruelty by continuing to grant loans to those who profit from bloodsports.

lender.name: Illonne
lender.loan_because: Because I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: A traditional housewife. It is more satisfying to see someone succeed because of my small contribution

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can, I will and I must.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that people get what they pay for and pay for what they get.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: having travelled widely, I have seen many countries where our donations can really make a positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, helping sick people with their diet and nutrition.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much, and want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world - I am a teacher.

lender.name: Madhu
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life.

lender.name: Lui
lender.loan_because: I feel that every person in this world should be given a chance to better their life. These are not people looking for a free hand out but rather mothers and fathers looking to use their knowledge and skill set to provide for their family. One must exploit their entrepreneural spirt. I will continue to admire and help these business people as much as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I pride myself in working along side my brother fixing houses up and selling them. I also enjoy helping my brother come up with marketing ideas for a product called the Germ Terminator.

lender.name: Chief Mike
lender.loan_because: Large banking corporations will never be able to provide a "Micro-Finance" service such as this does!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a volunteer in various education projects in the Philippines (esp. OLPC-Philippines, Farmer's field school, KVFMPC (A market vender's and small farmer's micro finance cooperative), Kalibo Public Elementary School II/Aklan Special Education Center.

lender.name: Joakim Jardenberg
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. Kiva is amazing.
lender.occupational_info: Founder and CEO of Mindpark AB. Senior advisor in all things internet and media. Old, new, digital. Some call me a social media therapist. CEO whisperer. Business angel and investor in early stage tech startups. I write, lecture, speak, facilitate and moderate large and small groups.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help those who are unfortunate.

lender.name: Veronique
lender.loan_because: I think I can help some people to get their economical autonomy.
lender.occupational_info: I study the heritage, i.e. monuments, houses or farms in a rural region. I was before in archeaological(prehistorical) service.

lender.name: Kare
lender.loan_because: I care about people and their futures and want them to have the same opportunity that I have. We are so lucky and we know it.
lender.occupational_info: I build houses , to a standard that is probably different to many parts of the world.

lender.name: Ewa
lender.loan_because: These people simply need it

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to care for the less fortunate among us. I see this as a chance to help lift someone up from poverty, to make a direct and real impact on their lives. I have been fortunate in my life - now I can give back in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a custodian in a local high school.

lender.name: Keri
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to dance.

lender.name: Jeanette & Robert
lender.loan_because: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity. - Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Greg Royal
lender.loan_because: Life has been very fortunate for me, it is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software entrepreneur from New Zealand. I help create technology that help people communicate.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It seems such a positive way to help other business owners globally.
lender.occupational_info: I help executive and business owner women clearly communicate their unique skills for business success.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Inorder to fund the account
lender.occupational_info: Kind of foreign exchange online.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I believe...
lender.occupational_info: I love my job. It is very physical, technical and challenging. I am a woman in a mans world, and am proof that anything is possible, if given the opportunity.

lender.name: philippe
lender.loan_because: I can help, and I see through my extensive travelling ( for my job) that there is a big need

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Deeply religious retired physician.

lender.name: Nkat
lender.loan_because: I think some of the stuff that is done with the loans is pretty cool.
lender.occupational_info: stuff of the beehive

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in not being indifferent. I believe in people. I believe in our collective strenght to do right by each other.

lender.name: the Lewis girls
lender.loan_because: I want my children to learn about being part of a larger world.
lender.occupational_info: Business owner and stay-at-home Mom.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I've had my own art business for almost 40 years here in California and always appreciated any help I received from other people. I wanted to do something for someone else who has their own business.
lender.occupational_info: For my art business, I paint with watercolors and have sold my artwork for 40 years. I have had a part time job for 4 years making signs and art for Trader Joe's.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in a place with ample opportunity. I believe in sharing some of that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses improve their profitability and worker satisfaction.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Since I retired from teaching after 20 years, my husband and I have our own financial planning company.

lender.name: Ron
lender.occupation: Consultant to Nonprofit and Public Organizations
lender.loan_because: Kiva is doing great work and with a relatively small investment I am able to pool with a larger group of people and effect change somewhere on the planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant to nonprofit and public organizations specializing in management restructuring, leadership development, strategic planning, evaluation, and new program development. I live in Desert Hot Springs, CA and Joshua Tree, CA.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to be able to help people around the world. It's more personal than supporting a large organization and not really knowing where your money goes. It's a really cool idea and also fun!

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva I can be a part of the empowerment of women in poor communities, promoting gender-equity.

lender.name: David T
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of other human being's ambitions and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find work that I enjoy doing, working with people to achieve common goals with a balance of living life.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of junior project managers in the development of websites and Internet media campaigns (emails, ad banners, etc.) for Fortune 100 companies.

lender.name: Scot
lender.loan_because: Supporting hard working people throughout the world is the best form of diplomacy. Helping others is what Americans are all about.
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain computer networks that help businesses grow and prosper.

lender.name: Mara & Bryan
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world better by encouraging financial independence and self-sufficiency for others.

lender.name: ECB-3M Canada
lender.loan_because: We are a team of people who want to help eliminate poverty. We like KIVA's concept of using micro-financing to help needy entrepreneurs who wish to learn how to earn their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Our team is comprised of many skills, genders, cultures, and ages from a variety of job functions including: Marketing, Sales, Technical Service, Administration, Management, and Customer Service. Our people are proud to be able to help others in this way, i.e., through KIVA. Best wishes...

lender.name: esther&jeff
lender.loan_because: we made an agreement to use a portion of the sale of esther's sculpture to jeff for loans in perpetuity to entrepreneurs through kiva
lender.occupational_info: we both work in the finance industry; jeff is also a philanthropist and esther also sculpts

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: It could make a difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I develop marketing programs for food products, such as coupons, sampling events & newspaper advertisements

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: Electronic assembly for various customers

lender.name: Rich Amooi
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to give back and be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I entertain people at wedding celebrations.

lender.name: Aldo
lender.loan_because: I remember how difficult it was for me to get a little seed money to help start my projects.
lender.occupational_info: I am the creative director in a collective editorial and design think tank. We develop design strategies and editorial packages for young and new artists and media outlets.

lender.name: Jenney
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My job is at a university in the United States in the Office of International Education. I assist American students who study abroad at foreign universities, and I also assist foreign students who come to my university to study.

lender.name: Gita
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed by our daughter-- It is a small way I can make the world a better place for Meg to grow up in.
lender.occupational_info: I was a grade 3 teacher for seven years, which I found to be extremely exciting and fulfilling. Now as a mother, however, I am so happy to be at home enjoying this time with my precious little girl!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It is a beautiful, powerful, wonderful thing!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it's a small world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: My fiance is from Guatemala and I know that I can make a contribution to his home country and the people who are trying to sustain their lives and help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work on domestic policy that affects women business owners and the issues that matter most to them like healthcare and other things that affect them and their families.

lender.name: Donation Jarheads
lender.loan_because: We put all our loose change into a big mason jar and twice a year, put it to better use.
lender.occupational_info: Parents: media industry. Kids: School.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in poorer parts of the world who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: S. F.
lender.loan_because: I love helping in this manner.
lender.occupational_info: When a teacher is ill or cannot work for a day, they telephone me and I go in an take their place for that day. One school has 4 classes daily, the second school has 5 classes daily.

lender.name: Steve & Clare
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: i think i have to share some of my luck in life with those who really need just a small push forward in some very really difficult conditions
lender.occupational_info: Stressfull but...enjoyable

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I perform and teach various styles of drums and percussion.

lender.name: Charu
lender.loan_because: I love to help people trying to make a living. There is a saying 'If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. If you teach a man how to fish, you feed him for his life'. I hope that all Kiva entrepreneurs will be very successful and create a lot of prosperity for their cities and nations.
lender.occupational_info: We are building an online sports community that helps local sports groups become more organized and stay connected.

lender.name: Jorge and Carina
lender.loan_because: my wife and I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Ann-Louise
lender.occupational_info: Administrating municipal waste collection in a community with 30 000 inhabitants. I work part-time and also take care of my two children.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make the world a little better.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to better themselves.

lender.name: José and Barbara
lender.loan_because: We, from different countries, met travelling many years ago in Japan and have been blessed in our lives. We feel microlending via Kiva is a way we can help empower others and return our blessings in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: José consults with businesses and organisations to help people work together more easily. Barbara is a retired primary school teacher.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: As an Entrepreneur i have a responsibility
lender.occupational_info: Making a difference

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: D.A.
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace corps volunteer (in Adzopé & Bouaké) in the Ivory Coast in the '70s & have wonderful memories of my experiences with the people in my 3 years there
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language in France

lender.name: Jan & Gary
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of good people who live in troubled circumstances. They work hard and struggle to provide life's necessities for their families and strive to make a better life for their children. It is our privilege to be able to give them a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher / Transportation

lender.name: Tayyab
lender.loan_because: Paying it back.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I build, test, and launch rockets into outer space.

lender.name: Perry and Laureen
lender.loan_because: great way to help on a personal level!

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: it's great to help, specially microbusiness
lender.occupational_info: I run my own small IT company on the rise

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: life has been good to me and I'd like to make someone else's life good to her! (Or him!)
lender.occupational_info: Helping use resources wisely.

lender.name: Paul & Karen
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: $25 to borrowers is worth a lot more than $25 is to me. I also want to support women entrepreneurs worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is at a corporate office and I do volunteer work in social reproductive justice.

lender.name: Cathy, Josh, and JJ
lender.loan_because: We love the ingenius solution Kiva provides to help good people around the world to improve their lives. We view participating in Kiva's organization as a priviledge!
lender.occupational_info: Cathy is a physician in the US Air Force and takes care of children with heart disease. I am an anesthesiologist, and I care for adults undergoing heart surgery.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: God has given to me very graciously, and it is His to give, and mine to merely manage. I thank God for giving me all I have, and I want to share his generosity with others.
lender.occupational_info: I design software for computers.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but I will give what I can.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have help in the past and want to do the same now for others.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of people. Something banks cannot see in a credit application.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: Christ teaches us to love everyone and to help each other. We're all children of God.

lender.name: Terri & family
lender.loan_because: We are praying for our world and it's people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a communications company

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: .. to inspire hope in someone
lender.occupational_info: -take care of children with severe medical need. -Goal, to work more with animals (perhaps through conservation).. pursue my writing...

lender.name: R & K
lender.loan_because: we want to help another family -thanks John and Heather!!!

lender.name: Ralph and Rocky
lender.loan_because: ....rather than sending money to a large organization where a large percentage would be used to cover administrative costs, our money will go directly to a person in need.....over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: Although retired we have started four businesses that not only provide money for travel and home improvement projects but also allows us to stay involved with our local community. We began by opening a restaurant, then a moped and boat rental company for tourists as well as operating a cottage rental business.

lender.name: A J
lender.loan_because: I travel to many impoverished countries and to be able to help them would be extremely rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I represent two major aluminum producing companies of the world. I market their products and sell them to end customers that process the aluminum into finished good for automotive, constructions and aerospace.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I know that I and others like me help to enable people all over the world to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with an incredible family and wish to share our blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and spend my days taking care of my husband, my daughters and grandchildren and crochet and quilt for charity.

lender.name: Momom
lender.loan_because: "The poor themselves can create a poverty-free world — all we have to do is to free them from the chains that we have put around them." - Muhammad Yunus, Grameen Bank, Founder

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: In my travels around the world, I have met many kind, intelligent people who can improve their lives and their community if only given a chance.
lender.occupational_info: When I am in the United States, I am a doctor for sick children in the hospital. When I work in other countries, I volunteer in both hospitals and rural clinics.

lender.name: Rafael
lender.loan_because: it's time I start giving my money to someone who could make good use of it.

lender.name: Matthew and Doreen
lender.occupational_info: I test water, sediment, and fish samples for pollution.

lender.name: David Matis
lender.loan_because: I loan because I'm paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to develop professional skills in the areas of impact and influence, confidence, interpersonal awareness, and collaboration.

lender.name: jit
lender.loan_because: It make sense from pure economic perspective as well as from return on investment point of view.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Charities are wonderful and vital for those in need. A cycle of dependence oppresses the people that charity means to help. Micro-loans are a solution.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government as a purchasing specialist.

lender.name: GypsyKT
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I interpret English into visual sign language for people who are deaf and hard of hearing.

lender.name: Teruko
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone.

lender.name: Michael Alexander
lender.loan_because: I can help my brothers and sisters in other parts of the world who aren't as fortunate as I.
lender.occupational_info: We tell stories that unify all people and help to make our world sustainable

lender.name: Ritika & Brian
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Dax
lender.loan_because: It's my way of sharing my blessings and to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach finance and entrepreneurship to high school students. Mentoring them at a young age to be smart about money.

lender.name: adam
lender.loan_because: The idea to assist people in need with tools and finances to be self productive and to build on their own success is excellent. I feel privileged to have come from a loving family and to be in the position to help someone pursue a goal.
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a travel agency in West Vancouver, Canada. I arrange all the travel needs for any destination on earth.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: dreams can come true.

lender.name: Carlien
lender.loan_because: small credits can have big impact! Being self-employed I like to support fellow entrepreneurs in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I advice and train professionals who do development work in low and middle-income countries. I'm specialized in local economic development.

lender.name: Sue Andy Bec & Bella
lender.loan_because: To provide opportunity to people who wouldn't ordinarily qualify or have access to loans via the normal channels. My belief is in empowering people and aiding self sufficiency within communities to help lift the standard of living for people effected by poverty. More importantly however, is that our own children grow up in a culture of giving and develop this creed as a part of their life ethic.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in business and my children attend school.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: life may not be fair, but that's a sorry excuse for not trying.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others in a meaningful way.I loved to help people who needs help.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: This is a great way for people to help themselves.

lender.name: fulgen
lender.loan_because: I can, and they need.

lender.name: glenn
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to make a difference.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I imagine the lives of others.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: i loen bcos i want to go in to? transporttation bussiness..a?m not cabeble faniacialy
lender.occupational_info: help me out..

lender.name: Tonton
lender.loan_because: i think bank not make there job to give chance for normal project ! they want so more win for no risk.
lender.occupational_info: i work for computer manufacturer in after sales services .

lender.name: salim
lender.loan_because: because I believ in the principals of earth care,people care and fare share .
lender.occupational_info: freedom through self development

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It feels absolutely right to help people with a hand up instead of a hand-out.

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: we must help who need us

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: It is a high impact way to encourage the growth and spirit of a business owner. Everyone deserves a loan with little to no interest!!
lender.occupational_info: Body worker who focuses on chronic pain.

lender.name: Yousra
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as part of the solution.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I fix electrical and computer problems on cars

lender.name: Matthew Kevan McGettigan
lender.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do.
The cold indifference needed to not try and help people in less wealthy parts of the world would be as bad, to my mind, as if I had caused them to be less wealthy in the first place.
It's better than giving to charity because the money is re-paid and then I can give it again. So the benefits keep multiplying.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in a wildlife reserve managing the land for conservation (so lots of wildlife can live there) and helping to educate people about the importance of nature.
Also, I help people who want to come and visit the park to do so safely and in a way that will not harm the wildlife.

lender.name: Kunle & Tutu...
lender.loan_because: IT'S A BLESSING TO BE ABLE TO HELP OTHER IN NEED.ALL THANKS GOES TO GOD WHO IS ABLE TO PROVIDE EVERY BLESSING IN ABUNDANCE SO WE COULD ALWAYS HAVE ENOUGH FOR EVERY GOOD WORK.THANK YOU LORD !

lender.name: Yahia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build value for themselves.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I would like to help in some way to improve someone else's life.

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I beleive people can take good profit of the money I loan and they can improve their lifes
lender.occupational_info: I'm a medical doctor. IAll my life I worked for public instituitions. I never did private clinic. I beleive all the community must improve their lifes same time as me.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe that it would be a better world if people had jobs and food to eat, thats one of the reasons. i also think that if we loan we can learn about other people in the world, and help them have a life, i hope that the peoeple that i loan to can have a better life and have a happier life.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student hoping to help the world. what i do is get up in the morning, ride the bus to my school sit through nine classes play my favorite sport in the worls, tennis, and then ride the late bus home to my house relax and do it the next day.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself I want to help others do the same. I just want to help and know the money I give get's to the actual person/s.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Personal Assistant. Performing office skills, running errands, assisting client to doctors, store, bank, etc. I also do light home care, cleaning with environmentally safe products, some of which I make myself. I am also moving into, consulting business and homeowners on being more "Green".

lender.name: Nuno
lender.loan_because: nothing compares to the gift of giving and change lives for better...

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to teach my children that it doesn't take much money to improve someone's life if we give together. Skipping one fast food meal won't hurt us and the money we would have spent can improve someone elses life significantly.
lender.occupational_info: Homeschool Family. We teach our children in our home instead of sending them to public school.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Micha
lender.loan_because: I have had a blessed life, and want to help others if i can.
lender.occupational_info: Web Application Designer, Creative Director, and UI Specialist in a wide variety of business applications.

lender.name: Sihar
lender.loan_because: Want to make your business electricity bill payment counter and telephone
lender.occupational_info: I worked as an engineer for setting telecommunications devices to generate signals to remote areas such as device Ericsson, Huawei and others.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I am able to and enjoy doing it. Even donating small amounts still help and its good to know that.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I study the Earth's climate and how ship pollution changes the chemistry of the atmosphere.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I truly care.Everyone deserves a chance at succes no matter who they are or where they come from.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to make a happy home for my family and am a part employee for Safeway in the Meat Department as a Meat Wrapper. I run a machine that tightly wraps steaks, hamburger and roasts in plastic wrap to keep it fresh for consumers. I also prepare food items in a display case for customers to take home for their dinner.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is an important part of the global economy and self image. If you simply add a few dollars into the economy of a nation in need you help support that economy on the world stage as well as helping to support a business owner and a human being.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner of a sewer maintenance business that does work for cities and counties.

lender.name: Sanjaya
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with a Kiva Field Partner, Angkor Mikroheranhvatho Kampuchea (AMK) in Cambodia, helping them implement a new core banking system and other IT projects.

lender.name: Albinus
lender.loan_because: it is an attempt of sharing. I enjoy the success of others.I love the spirit of enterprise and risk taking.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US FDA in the area of regulating medicines. By inspecting and approving drugs the government ensures that quality is maintained .

lender.name: Sherman
lender.loan_because: All people need help from time to time
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator for a regional parks department

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: sharing wealth and promoting self reliance is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: As an expatriate, I seek to integrate my background in Occupational Therapy, my addiction to travel, and desire to create opportunities to enhance personal independence.

lender.name: Mackenzie & Lucy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people around the world that don't have everything that we do.
lender.occupational_info: We are in 3rd and 6th grades.

lender.name: Deca Software
lender.loan_because: We believe that small investments made by many people can help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Deca software (http://www.decasoftware.com) is the innovative leader in online Microsoft Office 2007 training (http://www.officetestprep.com) Our products are currently used at major universities, businesses, and individuals throughout the United States and Canada. Our main products are SimNet Online for Office 2007 and SimNet TestPrep for Office 2007.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom and a freelance writer and editor.

lender.name: Anil
lender.loan_because: I can. I can't think of a better way to use my money.
lender.occupational_info: I work with banks and individuals who want to invest their money and watch it grow for the future.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someones life who really needs a helping hand. I have travelled enough to see real poverty and I realize how lucky I am to be from Canada. After being inspired by Muhammad Yunus as to the power of microfinance I heard about Kiva and instantly I joined up. I only hope I can convince others of the benefits of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aviation technician with the Canadian Air Force.

lender.name: Ejvind
lender.loan_because: Lending a helping hand might help other people change their lives for the better
lender.occupational_info: The communicating link between companies and clients at work and enjoying performing classical music and painting off work

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: We have been incredibly blessed and want to share that karmic bounty with the broader global community.

lender.name: Kim and Peter
lender.loan_because: This is the least I can do...

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: My hope is that if I pay it forward, the momentum will continue.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful the help people have given me and I know the joy of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Christian values to 3 and 4 yr olds.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and have had the luxury of resources to help me start. Nothing beats the feeling of owning your own business! I want others who have fewer resources than me to be able to support themselves too.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations connect with people who believe in their mission enough to provide resources of time, talent and treasure.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: To help families and businesses to grow. Sometimes you need money and sometimes you can lend to others. Neither opportunities should be missed.

lender.name: Phil and Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Craig & Mitzi
lender.loan_because: I wonder what the world would be if everyone did this instead of shooting each other.

lender.name: Keirnan
lender.loan_because: I like to feel that I have helped someone, but I prefer to feel that they are being productive with it.
lender.occupational_info: I borrow and lend money between banks. It is very intangible.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: "A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: I help people to heal themselves in mind, body, & spirit.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: my money can go farther and be more useful in other lands where people do not have as much opportunity as in my country. When my neighbors are successful, I am more secure.

lender.name: Kappu and Jay
lender.loan_because: It is more pleasureable to give than to take
lender.occupational_info: Manage software project and ensure their successful completion.

lender.name: L-burg FCC
lender.loan_because: We believe God calls us to change the world!

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and it enables enterprising people to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Government Policy

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: My 4 yr old granddaughter told me "Sharing Is Good"

lender.name: KENNETH W
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with their business since I'm in business. If you want to receive, then you have to give.
lender.occupational_info: I raise goats on the southern side of Houston, Texas. Plus, I tutor college algebra.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a prosper country with a stable job. I would like to help people as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research on educational administration and student learning.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to invest in making a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to my retirement, I managed a medical program for children with severe disabilities.

lender.name: Alysia and Scott
lender.loan_because: We want to help people live their dreams. We hope the loans we give can make a difference for someone's business and family.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a shot.
lender.occupational_info: Joy; spiritual, physical, emotional, intellectual joy.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit!

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: i have enough.

lender.name: Suresh
lender.loan_because: God gives me with a purpose.

lender.name: Sarah,Chelsea,Trevor
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers us a way to help others pursue their dreams. We are inspired by the caring support of donors, and the determination of those that receive the loans. We donate with love. :)
lender.occupational_info: Learning how to be like the people that we admire.

lender.name: Marc
lender.occupational_info: I am a touristic guide

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone;s life who is not as fortunate as we are.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a home and commercial repair business. We do lots of small repairs that alot of the contractors do not want to do.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Jo Anne
lender.loan_because: I think its a wonderful way to really try to effect change in the world. It's simple, direct and personal.
lender.occupational_info:
I have the privilege of spending my days with 18 delightful Kindergarten children as their teacher. We learn, laugh, and sing together. It's a great way to make a living!
The photo is of me and my daughter, Sara, who is also a Kiva member!

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: it's a way to help the world work
lender.occupational_info: writing and helping others

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to start and maintain a successful business. My mom introduced me to this organization and I love the idea of being able to support new business owners in other parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: Graphic design of company logos, stationery items such as business cards, letterhead, etc., other printed materials that promote a business, advertising, web design.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: As I sit here studying to get my degree in business, I realize that there are people out there, less fortunate than me ready to work, but don't have the money to do so. I have been to some third world countries, and the people are so warm, welcoming, and hard working. The least I can do is loan them so money so they can get going and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a freshman at an American University.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: kiva is a fantastic idea to help people in other countries
lender.occupational_info: help people in my country by talking

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the people I'm helping out.
I believe they have the enthusiasm, work ethic, and vision to achieve what they have set out to do, and this is a way I can support their efforts.

lender.name: Jason Wagner
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: clarisse
lender.loan_because: Because I want to participate in a more just and better world; because I wish to actively participate in the people happiness, in the people who are fighting for a better life, and the realization of their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: In my work I do many different things: given telephone calls to get customers, make proposals and organize events related adventure activities and nature activities: as rafting, canoeing, Climbing, Rappel, Bodyboard. What I like most in my profession is the contact with people (each person has a different way of thinking) and the possibility of providing moments of leisure and coexistence with nature, allowing a more relaxed and healthy living.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do. I want the world to see that America can be a kind and gernerous country.
lender.occupational_info: I create stories for movies and tv.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I was given a donation to Kiva and am so glad that this donation will make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: We plan the logistics for meetings and travel incentive programs for corporate accounts worldwide.

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because:
Our mission here at Uniwolf Services, is to provide jobs that are a much-needed scenario in the state of Michigan. We provide a needed service to the auto industry at a relatively cheap rate.
Our target is to employ up to five unemployed persons, men and women, a year for at “least” the next five years. Our target is also to save the dealerships as much money as possible, especially with the downfall of the auto industry.
I feel that within the five years, Uniwolf Services will help with the incline in the unemployment rate by employing the unemployed. I feel that if we here at Uniwolf Services keeps revolving our revenue back into our business we will be able to grow beyond our five-year plan. I feel that we will not sell, even if we generate enough money to retire. Reason being, no one can run this and generate the relationship I have with these customer, some being since day one. After talking to many different people, much of whom are out there to just survive (which is okay) I feel that our success and knowledge is worth sharing to people that need to put food on the table.
lender.occupational_info: We here at Uniwolf Services provide a quality washing of vehicles on dealership lots at a price everyone can live with. While in fact the car washes that you drive your car to charge a discounted rate, here at Uniwolf cut that down in order for the dealerships to save even more money. I have three men that go out on days that are the right temperature and not raining to wash, rinse and dry every vehicle that a dealership wants maintained. We have a solid schedule that is done every day of every week.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great! I am so fortunate and I want to share my good fortune and love with others.
lender.occupational_info: It is a joy!

lender.name: Alessandria
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone in the world deserves a chance to succeed in life

lender.name: Emilie & Link
lender.loan_because: We have been entrepreneurs, and understand the importance of getting support to start a business. We feel that this is an important way to contribute on a global level and help people to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Link is a computer programmer and Emilie is a jewellery designer.

lender.name: Joe, Z, Noah & Katya
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes for a Major US airline. I travel all over the world and love to meet new people.

lender.name: M. José
lender.loan_because: The most we can do to help a person is to help he or she to help himself and that´s what we find here, people working to build a better future for them and their families. And we all deserve and opportunity to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student. Besides that I´m also an entrepreneur working on many personal projects.

lender.name: Renita
lender.loan_because: Someone believed in my husband and helped him start a business that has become very successful. It's my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at an equestrian center that helps handicapped children and adults ride horses.

lender.name: Marcie
lender.loan_because: I have many student loans I am currently paying. These loans allowed me to have an excellent education, and great career. They truly changed my life!
